channel.title: Lifestyle on Portfolio website for Yu Luo
channel.description: Recent content in Lifestyle on Portfolio website for Yu Luo

item.title: Self Introduction
item.description: Short introduction Born in Ningbo in China, a beautiful seaside city, Yu is a open-minded girl and always willing to explore more aspects of the world, such as studying in different countries, traveling around world. Yu wants to learn specific and practical financial knowledge and get lasting friendship with diversified students in LBS. Gaining competence in job market is her goal in master stage. Background Education Experience: Yu holds a BSc Economics degree from Renmin University of China with an one-year exchange experience in University of California, Davis.
